page.title: 16INDOOR ACTIVITIES
page.content: The largest Wilts Womens Institute, Ladies Group, Mothers Union, Womens Fellowship, Civic Society, Whist, Photographic, Youth and Theatre Clubs hold regular meetings and outings. The Band has many young players from Aldbourne & Swindon and there are regular practices for concerts, com- petitions, TV and recording sessions. Scouts, Cubs & Brownies meet in their own hall. The Memorial Hall provides an excellent stage and kitchen for plays, wedding receptions, dances, charity lunches, and exhibitions. Sponsored events, sales and coffee mornings raise funds and much time and effort goes into charitable work. This year some Â£7000 will be raised for various good causes such as famine relief, children, cancer, blind, hospice, church work and missions both at home and overseas
